channel.title: Tech Talks
channel.description: Its a collection of technical talks that I enjoyed watching. I have avoided putting product announcements or company specific talks.You can also contribute to the list by forking on github.

item.title: Pixar - A Human Story of Computer Animation
item.description: Great Q&A with founders of Pixar on how computer graphics over last few decades.

item.title: What the heck is the event loop anyway?
item.description: Great talk on inner workings of Javascript event loop.

item.title: Concurrency Is Not Parallelism - Rob Pike
item.description: Great talk by Rob pike on how concurrency not always means parallelism. Slides are available here.

item.title: Sun Microsystems founders panel(2007)
item.description: Great interview of founders of Sun Microsystems Scott McNealy, Andy Bechtolsheim, Bill Joy and Vinod Khosla.

item.title: Javascript the new good parts - Douglas Crockford
item.description: Good talk on new good parts in Javascript and authorâ€™s ideas on how new programming language should look like.

item.title: Donald Knuth - All Questions Answered
item.description: Great Q&A session with Donald Knuth, author of The Art of Computer Programming

item.title: The Origin of Javascript with Brendan Eich - podcast
item.description: Rare podcast on story of Javascript origins. It covers from Netscape days to V8 and Node.js.

item.title: Code rush - Netscape Mozilla Documentary 1998 - 2000
item.description: Documentary on how Netscape open sourced their browser to create Mozilla and Firefox.

item.title: The Origins of Linux - Linus Torvalds (2001)
item.description: Rare talk and Q&A on history of linux with Linus Torvalds in 2001.

item.title: The Language of the System - Rich Hickey
item.description: Great talk by Rich Hickey how programming languages should support system building rather than program building.
